meanings.definition: The front part of the leg below the knee; the shin.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally bumped her cnemis on the table.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp pain in his cnemis after running into the wall.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to nibble on her owner's cnemis.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's cnemis gleamed under the stage lights.
meanings.sent5: The soccer player's cnemis absorbed the impact of the ball.

meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the x-ray showing the patient's fractured cnemis.
meanings.sent2: The athlete strengthened his cnemis through specific exercises.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologist discovered a fossilized cnemis of a prehistoric creature.
meanings.sent4: The warrior's armor protected his cnemis in battle.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the structure of the cnemis bone in detail.
